meanings.definition: The quality or state of being extremely funny or amusing.
meanings.sent1: Her jokes always bring a sense of hilariousness to the room.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's performance was filled with hilariousness.
meanings.sent3: The hilariousness of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His comedic timing added a touch of hilariousness to the show.
meanings.sent5: The children's play was full of innocent hilariousness.

meanings.definition: The capacity to provoke laughter or amusement.
meanings.sent1: The movie's hilariousness had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the hilariousness of good stand-up comedy.
meanings.sent3: The hilariousness of the situation caught me off guard.
meanings.sent4: His witty remarks added a layer of hilariousness to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The sitcom's hilariousness made it a favorite among viewers.
